meaning: She who has complete knowledge of the creation, sustenance and dissolution of the creation is Bhagawati. She is an embodiment of both knowledge (vidya) and ignorance (avidya).
commentary:
She is the form of complete prosperity. Bhagawati is Prabrahma.Our ancient scriptures define Bhagawati as-

उत्पत्तिम् प्रलयम् चैव भुता-नामागतिम् गतिमविद्यय विद्ययोस् तत्त्वम् वेत्तेएति भगवति सोw (Utpattim pralayam caiva bhutā-nāmāgatim gatimavidyaya vidyayos tattvam vetteeti Bhagavati sow)
